documents.content: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a branch of artificial intelligence that helps computers understand, interpret and manipulate human language. NLP draws from many disciplines, including computer science and computational linguistics.

Deep learning is a subset of machine learning that uses neural networks with multiple layers to model and understand complex patterns in data. It has revolutionized fields like computer vision and speech recognition.

Computer vision is a field of artificial intelligence that trains computers to interpret and understand the visual world. Using digital images from cameras and videos, machines can accurately identify and classify objects.
